what: Create a Factor Analysis-like low rank matrix factorization object — fa_like
title: Create a Factor Analysis-like low rank matrix factorization object — fa_like
text: low rank matrix factorization matrix X parameterized X ~= X %*% B %*% t(Y). object "factor analysis-like" middle matrix decomposition arbitrary rather diagonal.

title: Create a Factor Analysis-like low rank matrix factorization object — fa_like
Create a Factor Analysis-like low rank matrix factorization object — fa_like
text: Z matrix embeddings observation. B mixing matrix describing observation embeddings topics interact. diagonal! Y matrix describing compositions various topics factors. subclasses character vector subclasses. Optional, defaults NULL. ... Optional additional items pass constructor.

title: Create a Factor Analysis-like low rank matrix factorization object — fa_like
code: s <- svd(as.matrix(trees))  fa_like(s$u, diag(s$d), s$v) #> Factor Analysis-Like Matrix Factorization #> --------------------------------------- #>  #> Rank: 3 #> Rows: 31 #> Cols: 3 #> Components #>  #> Z: 31 x 3 [matrix]  #> B: 3 x 3 [matrix]  #> Y: 3 x 3 [matrix]

title: MovieLens 100K dataset — ml100k
text: Standard benchmarking dataset recommendation systems. 100k movie ratings 1682 movies 943 users. user rated least 20 movies.

title: MovieLens 100K dataset — ml100k
MovieLens 100K dataset — ml100k
text: object class dgCMatrix 943 rows 1682 columns.

title: MovieLens 100K dataset — ml100k
text: Stored Matrix::dgCMatrix object, sparse matrix. row corresponds user column movie.

title: MovieLens 100K dataset — ml100k
text: F. Maxwell Harper Joseph . Konstan. 2015. MovieLens Datasets: History Context. ACM Transactions Interactive Intelligent Systems (TiiS) 5, 4, Article 19 (December 2015), 19 pages. DOI=http://dx.doi.org/10.1145/2827872 https://grouplens.org/datasets/movielens/100k/

what: Create a SVD-like low rank matrix factorization object — svd_like
title: Create a SVD-like low rank matrix factorization object — svd_like
text: low rank matrix factorization matrix X parameterized X ~= u %*% diag(d) %*% t(v). object "svd-like" middle matrix decomposition must strictly diagonal.

title: Create a SVD-like low rank matrix factorization object — svd_like
Create a SVD-like low rank matrix factorization object — svd_like
text: u matrix "left singular-ish" vectors. d vector "singular-ish" values. v matrix "right singular-ish" vectors. subclasses character vector subclasses. Optional, defaults NULL. ... Optional additional items pass constructor.

title: Create a SVD-like low rank matrix factorization object — svd_like
code: s <- svd(as.matrix(trees))  # using the constructor directly svd_like(s$u, s$d, s$v) #> Low Rank Matrix Factorization #> ----------------------------- #>  #> Rank: 3 #> Rows: 31 #> Cols: 3 #> d[rank]: 5.90691893513068 #> Components #>  #> u: 31 x 3 [matrix]  #> d: 3      [numeric]  #> v: 3 x 3 [matrix]   # coercing svd-like lists as_svd_like(s) #> Low Rank Matrix Factorization #> ----------------------------- #>  #> Rank: 3 #> Rows: 31 #> Cols: 3 #> d[rank]: 5.90691893513068 #> Components #>  #> u: 31 x 3 [matrix]  #> d: 3      [numeric]  #> v: 3 x 3 [matrix]
